item.title: AI Is Eating Data Center Power Demand—and It’s Only Getting Worse
item.description: A new analysis of AI hardware being produced and how it is being used attempts to estimate the vast amount of electricity being consumed by AI.

item.title: A United Arab Emirates Lab Announces Frontier AI Projects—and a New Outpost in Silicon Valley
item.description: As Donald Trump pens deals in the Middle East, the gulf nation opens a research lab in San Francisco.

item.title: DOGE Used a Meta AI Model to Review Emails From Federal Workers
item.description: DOGE tested and used Meta’s Llama 2 model to review and classify responses from federal workers to the infamous “Fork in the Road” email.

item.title: Anthropic’s New Model Excels at Reasoning and Planning—and Has the Pokémon Skills to Prove It
item.description: When Anthropic's older Claude model played Pokemon Red, it spent “dozens of hours” stuck in one city and had trouble identifying non-player characters...

item.title: Kesha Wants to ‘Smash’ the Music Industry With a New LinkedIn-Style App
item.description: Ahead of her new album and tour, pop titan Kesha says she wants to start a new platform called Smash that helps artists connect, collaborate, and coll...
